Monster Rancher 3 Archive
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process: Subcode Data Files: Monster Rancher 3 Archive
Please remember that code derived from music CDs is the only code that works in MR3!
Don't bother requesting DVD subcode!
We have no way to produce it in text files.
Also, monsters are easily gotten by trading Sharkport saves in MR3.
This is ultimately cheaper than burning the discs.
Info posted here is for use with the North American NTSC game.
